sourcesContent:
import "./Home.scss"; import { useParams } from "react-router"; import { useSingleProduct } from "./GetApi"; export const ProductPage = () => { const { id } = useParams<{ id?: string }>(); const parsedId = id ? parseInt(id, 10) : undefined; const { data } = useSingleProduct(parsedId); return (

Product Detail

{data?.category}

{data?.title}

Product Description

{data?.description}

); };
